text: Mortal Thoughts is a 1991 American mystery crime thriller movie which stars Demi Moore, Bruce Willis and Harvey Keitel. Willis plays a deranged and violent husband who is murdered one night; Moore plays Cynthia (who gets interrogated); Keitel plays a detective in this movie. == Other websites == * * * Category:1991 crime thriller movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies directed by Alan Rudolph Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Mortal Thoughts
